website redesign, branding, & copyediting

In my position as Creative Assistant at Enthought in Austin Texas, I was responsible for maintaining and improving the company's website. This work was undertaken as part of a rebranding of the company to create more coherent visual and textual messaging.

Beginning with the existing logo and website, I designed icons and styles to support legible and persuasive web content. I then rewrote the majority of site text to convey a modern and professional tone with more concise language. I also initiated email marketing and social media campaigns to create concurrent promotion/support mechanisms in our communication framework.

To see the site live, visit www.enthought.com.
